msContents.summary: Tax register, recording the daily collection of money taxes in the village of Karanis; the name of each tax-payer paying the poll-tax is cross-referenced with a page of another register, where taxpayers were listed geographically

msItemStruct.note: Due to the size of this tax roll (P.Mich. IV/1, 225 + IV/2, 358), its content has been divided in the present database into several cards (one for each column).

div.ab: (Col.) 171;;In Mesore, on the [1st] intercalary days:;Pasoxis, son of Pasoxis and Taseus, grandson of Panther, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;Phanomgeus, son of Petheus and Tamystha, grandson of Satabous, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;Petaus, son of Onnophris and Tkateis, grandson of Petaus, for ch(--): 4 drachmai 28 obols;Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios and Heras, grandson of Pnepheros, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;Sarapion, son of Kames and Thaesis, grandson of Heras, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;[Onnophris], son of Onnophris and Thermouthis, grandson of Sambas, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;[Sambas], his brother, (born) of the same mother, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;[Athenion], son of Pyros and Tasoucharion, grandson of Athenion, for ch(--): 8 drachmai;Total for the day: 36 drachmai 28 obols.;;[On the 2nd, similarly:];[. . ., son of Petalos] and Taeuemeros, grandson of Petaus, for ch(--): 4 drachmai 28 obols;[Sarapion, son of Harpalos] and Tapetheus, grandson of Sarapion, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;[Didymos, son of Satabous] and Tanomgeus, grandson of Pakysis: the remainder of ch(--);[. . ., son of Petheus] and Herais, grandson of Keras: the remainder of ch(--);[Aphrodisis], son of Sisois and Thaisas, grandson of Petheus, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;[Kopaneus], son of Polydion and Politta, grandson of Kopaneus: 4 drachmai; (and) for ch(--): 8 drachmai;[Horos], son of Petaus and Tauris, grandson of Petaus, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;[Horos], son of Petheus and Eserempis, grandson of Aunes: the remainder of ch(--);Total for the day: 40 drachmai 1 obol.;;[On the 3rd, similarly:];[Petheus], son of Petheus and Tauris, grandson of Petheus, for the guards: 1 drachme; (and) for the guard towers: 7 drachmai. Total: 8 drachmai;[. . .], son of Pnepheros and Thaesis, grandson of Phanomgeus, for ch(--): 4 drachmai; (and) the remainder of the ch(--) of the priests;[Herakleides], son of Abykis and Herais, grandson of Abykis, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;[Sempronius] Vestinus - (through) Terpos - [for garden land of year 13: for apomoira], 15 drachmai; for olive (transportation), 3 drachmai 2 chalkoi; for naubion, 1 drachme 3 obols; for supplements, 3 drachmai 5 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; [for eparourion, 11 drachmai 5] 1/2 obols; for supplements, 1 drachme; for kollybos, 3 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi. Total: 37 drachmai 2 chalkoi. (In left margin: 36 drachmai 12 obols.)
